hero.heading: Tukuyobora mu nzira yo kugira ubuzima bwiza bwo mu mutwe
hero.description: Ahantu hafite ubumenyi ku bikomere kandi hatagira ivangura; dushyigikira abagore n'abahuye n'ihohoterwa tubaha serivisi z'ubuzima bwo mu mutwe zizewe, ubufasha mu bihe by'akaga n'inzira zo gukira — byose mu mutekano, impuhwe n'icyizere.

servicesSection.title: Serivisi zacu
servicesSection.subtitle: Ubufasha bwuzuye buhuye n'urugendo rwawe rwo gukira

professional.title: Ubufasha bw'umwuga
professional.description: Huza n'abajyanama bafite uruhushya babizobereye mu kuvura ibikomere no guhangana n'ihohoterwa rishingiye ku gitsina.

community.title: Umuryango w'abagenzi
community.description: Jya mu muryango ushyigikira abagore basangiye ubunararibonye.

aiChat.title: Chat y'ubufasha bwa AI
aiChat.description: Bona inama zihuse kandi zibitse ziboneka amasaha yose kugira ngo ubone ubufasha bw'ako kanya.

homeabout.tagline: Guteza imbere ubuzima bwiza bwo mu mutwe
homeabout.heading: HerHaven ni byinshi kurusha urubuga—ni ihuriro ritanga umutekano ku bagore barimo kongera kugarura ijwi ryabo nyuma yo guhura n'ibikomere.

features.confidentialSupport: Ubufasha bw'ibanga butangwa n'abajyanama bafite uruhushya basobanukiwe n'ibikomere
features.safeCommunity: Aho ku muryango hizewe ho gukira no kugaruka ku buzima

testimonials.title: Ibyo umuryango wacu uvuga
testimonials.subtitle: Inkuru nyazo z'abahuye n'ibyo bahuye na byo mu rugendo rwabo rwo gukira

about.title: Ibyerekeye HerHaven
about.subtitle: Gushyigikira abagore bahuye n'ihohoterwa mu buryo bufite impuhwe
about.description: HerHaven ni umushinga uhuriza hamwe inzobere mu buzima bwo mu mutwe, abatekinisiye n'abaharanira impinduka, ukaba wiyemeje guteza imbere imibereho myiza y'abahuye n'ihohoterwa rishingiye ku gitsina binyuze mu bikoresho by'ikoranabuhanga n'ubufasha bushingiye ku muryango.

vision.title: Ibyifuzo
vision.description: HerHaven yiyumvamo u Rwanda aho buri muntu wakorewe ihohoterwa ashobora kubona ubufasha bufite impuhwe, bwuzuye kandi butera ibyizere mu gukira.

mission.title: Inshingano
mission.description: Gushyigikira abantu bahuye n'ihohoterwa rishingiye ku gitsina mu Rwanda binyuze mu kongera uburyo bwo kubona ubufasha mu buzima bwo mu mutwe, kugabanya isura mbi no kubaka imiyoboro y'umutekano n'ubufatanye.

whyHerHaven.title: Kuki HerHaven?
whyHerHaven.description: Mu Rwanda, hafi igice cy'abagore bahuye n'ihohoterwa. HerHaven ni urubuga rw'ikoranabuhanga rutanga ubufasha bwizewe n'impuhwe, rufasha abagore kubona ubuvuzi, gukira no kubaka ubuzima bwiza.

empathy.title: Kumva undi
empathy.description: Inkuru ya buri muntu ihabwa agaciro.

safety.title: Umutekano
safety.description: Ibanga n'uburinzi bw'amakuru ni iby'ingenzi cyane.

healing.title: Gukira
healing.description: Gushyigikira gukura no kugaruka ku buzima bwiza.

collaboration.title: Ubufatanye
collaboration.description: Gukorana n'imiryango n'inzobere mu rwego rwo gutanga serivisi nziza.

listen.title: Tumvira mu bwubahane
listen.description: Turema umwanya uteje ubwoba aho abagore bahuye n'ihohoterwa bashobora gusangira uburambe bwabo, bumvikane nta kubagereranya, kandi amajwi yabo akabahwa agaciro.

build.title: Tubaka ahantu hizewe
build.description: Turema umwanya uteje ubwoba kandi wizewe aho abagore bashobora kubona inkunga, ibyabafasha, no gukira nta kwiheba cyangwa gucibwa urubanza.

empower.title: Duha imbaraga no guhuza
empower.description: Duhuza abahuye n'ihohoterwa n'abavuzi n'imiryango ishyigikira.

whyMatters.title: Impamvu iki gikorwa gikenewe
whyMatters.stat1Description: by'abagore mu Rwanda bahuye n'ihohoterwa rikorerwa n'umukunzi cyangwa umugabo
whyMatters.stat2Description: by'abahuye n'ihohoterwa babona ubuvuzi bwo mu mutwe
whyMatters.stat3Description: Imbuga z'ikoranabuhanga zishobora kugabanya isura mbi no korohereza kubona ubufasha

partners.title: Abafatanyabikorwa bacu
partners.subtitle: Dukorana kugira ngo dutere intambwe mu kubaka imiryango yizewe

joinUs.title: Duhuze kugira ngo tugire impinduka
joinUs.description: Niba uri umunyamwuga mu buzima bwo mu mutwe, umuryango udaharanira inyungu, cyangwa umuntu ushaka gushyigikira umurongo wacu, twakwishimira kumva ibyifuzo byawe.

resources.title: Icyicaro cy'ubumenyi
resources.subtitle: Tuguha ubumenyi n'ubusobanuro ku buzima bwo mu mutwe, gukira ibikomere no kubona ubufasha mu muryango
resources.noArticles: Nta nyandiko yabonetse ihuye n'ibyo wasabye.

support.title: Ukeneye ubufasha?
support.description: Niba uri mu bibazo cyangwa ushaka kuvugana n'umuntu, serivisi zacu z'inkunga zirahari 24/7. Ntabwo uri wenyine muri uru rugendo.

services.title: Serivisi zacu
services.subtitle: Uko HerHaven igufasha
services.description: HerHaven itanga uburyo bwuzuye bwo gushyigikira ubuzima bwo mu mutwe, igamije guha abagore ibikoresho n'ubumenyi byo gukira, gukura no kugira ubuzima bwiza.

professionalSupport.title: Ubufasha bw'umwuga
professionalSupport.description: Huza n'abajyanama bafite uruhushya basobanukiwe n'ibikomere n'ihohoterwa rishingiye ku gitsina. Urubuga rwacu ruba rwizewe kandi rutanga ahantu hizewe ho gukira.

peerCommunity.title: Umuryango w'abagenzi
peerCommunity.description: Jya mu muryango w'abandi bagore basangiye ubunararibonye. Sangira inkuru yawe, ubone inkunga, kandi mukure hamwe mu mutekano kandi byubahiriza amategeko.

aiChat.title: Chat y'ubufasha bwa AI
aiChat.description: Bona inama zihuse kandi zibitse zituruka ku kiganiro cyacu cya AI, cyubakiye ku mahame yo kumenya ibikomere. Kiraboneka 24/7 kugira ngo kiguhe ubufasha n'inkuru z'uburyo bwo kwiyitaho.

safeConfidential.title: Byizewe & Ibanga
safeConfidential.description: Ibanga ryawe n'umutekano wawe ni iby'ingenzi kuri twe. Ibiganiro byose birakingirwa kandi birinzwe kugira ngo wumve ufite umutekano.

crisisSupport.title: Ubufasha mu bihe by'amage 24/7
crisisSupport.description: Ubufasha bwihuse igihe ubikeneye. Shakisha umutaro n'ubufasha bwo guhagarika ibyago mu masaha yose.

educational.title: Ibyo kwiga
educational.description: Sobanukirwa n'amasomo yacu y'inyandiko, imfashanyigisho n'ibikoresho bigufasha kumenya byinshi ku buzima bwo mu mutwe, gukira no kwiyitaho.

contact.title: Twandikire
contact.subtitle: Ufite ikibazo cyangwa ukeneye ubufasha? Turahari kugira ngo tugufashe. Zuza ifishi hasi maze tuzagusubize vuba.

therapy.title: Abaganga bacu b'inzobere
therapy.subtitle: Ubufasha bw'umwuga
therapy.description: Huza n'abaganga bemewe kandi bafite ubumenyi mu gukira ibikomere, gutanga ubufasha mu buzima bwo mu mutwe no gufasha abagore mu rugendo rwabo rwo gukira.
therapy.searchPlaceholder: Shakisha ku izina, umwuga cyangwa ibisobanuro...
therapy.noResultsMessage: Gerageza guhindura ibyo ushaka cyangwa filtre zawe

footer.description: Ahantu hatishyurwa hafasha abagore n'abahuye n'ihohoterwa hatanga serivisi z'ubuzima bwo mu mutwe zihariye kandi zibitse, bigatuma gukira bishoboka biciye mu mutekano, impuhwe n'icyizere
footer.copyright: Copyright © {{year}} Her Haven. Uburenganzira bwose burabitswe.
